archimate:Capability.name: Content Moderating
archimate:Capability.documentation: Content Moderation is a digital capability used to screen and eliminate content that is irrelevant, obscene, illegal, or insulting to improve the quality of contents and maintain the identity of an online community and a social website. It involves managing users who create that type of unacceptable contents as well. Clear rules and policies for moderating contents must be implemented to avoid perceptions of bias or unfairness.
